metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20813 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Edit screen of Content Data ofMovable Type (Movable Type 7 r.4903 and earlier (Movable Type 7 Series) andMovable Type Advanced 7 r.4903 and earlier (Movable Type Advanced 7Series)) allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary script or HTML viaunspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
